description: This is a React component named FiltersSidebar, responsible for rendering a sidebar with filter options for an e-commerce platform. It displays various filter groups such as sizes, fragrance family, collections, colors, price ranges, and badges, allowing users to toggle filters and clear all selections.

methods.name: FiltersSidebar({ facets, selected, counts, onToggle, onClear })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a sidebar for product filters with toggle and clear functionalities.

ctags.name: FiltersSidebar
ctags.pattern: /^export default function FiltersSidebar({ facets, selected, counts, onToggle, onClear }) {$/
